wikipedia_page.main: Alfred Baxter (5 June 1898 – 8 January 1983) was a British weightlifter. He competed at the 1924 and 1928 Summer Olympics in the featherweight category (under 60 kg) and finished in 7th and 19th place, respectively.

response: *Alfred Baxter-Cox (1898–1958), Australian military officer and architect
